What are the treatments for tetrahydrobiopterin deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of tetrahydrobiopterin deficiency:  - Baby's First Test: Biopterin Defect in Cofactor Biosynthesis  - Baby's First Test: Biopterin Defect in Cofactor Regeneration  - Genetic Testing Registry: 6-pyruvoyl-tetrahydropterin synthase deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dihydropteridine reductase deficiency  - Genetic Testing Reg
